data.title: Church of Saint Mary – Rutherford, NJ
data.text:
We are called to form the Christian Community of Saint Mary Roman Catholic Church; we are protected by our Blessed Mother in whose patronage our parish has been placed under her title “Our Lady of the Rosary”.

Become a member of the Church of Saint Mary today. Join over 2,000 families who have made Saint Mary their home for generations.

January 1: Solemnity of Mary, Mother of God

August 15: Assumption of the Blessed Virgin Mary

November 1: All Saints’ Day

December 8: The Immaculate Conception

December 25: Christmas

Families are asked to be/become registered parishioners of the Church of Saint Mary before planning a baptism. Parents are required to attend the parish Baptism Class and provide the godparent’s sponsorship letters BEFORE the baptism date can be set. Call the Parish Office at 201-438-2200 for class dates and godparent handbook.

According to the N.J. Common Policy couples must register at least ONE YEAR in advance.

An appointment is necessary to visit the Parish Center on Saturdays and Sundays. Please call at least 48 hours ahead to schedule an appointment.

To read past articles on this Revival, the whole document, or the free study guide, click the Learn More button, or click the National Eucharistic Revival link at the top of any page.
